cards.title: NightMare
gameplay: when you discard a card, activate its [u]discard[/u] text.
powers: Draw a card. Discard a card. {NightMare} deals 1 target 1 Melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
Select a Hero. Increase the next Damage dealt by that hero by 2.

openingLines.default: ye dennae stand a chance. ye best just stand down now.

cards.title: Bring Another
body: Whenever {NightMare} destroys a target, she may deal 1 target 2 Melee damage, then discard the top card of your deck.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Reveal the top card of the villain deck. If it is a target, put it into play and increase the next damage {NightMare} deals it by 3. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.title: Cowabunga it is!
body: {NightMare} deals up to 3 targets 2 Melee damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Select a card from your trash and discard it.

cards.flavorText: “Oh, she just ran{BR}right in, didn't she?”

cards.title: Dynamic Entry
body: Destroy an environment card.
cards.flavorText: “See? there? go through the{BR}hole the nice horsey made.”

cards.title: Hold Yer Horses
body: Reduce damage taken by {NightMare} by 1.
When any damage is redirected to {NightMare}, reduce it by 1.
powers: {NightMare} deals 1 target 3 Melee damage. Reduce the next damage dealt by targets dealt damage this way by the damage they take.
cards.flavorText: “I get the plant one,{BR}you get the burney one.”

cards.title: Hoof Loose
body: When this card enters play, draw 2 cards.
If {NightMare} would be dealt 3 or more Damage from a single source, reduce it by 3, then destroy this card.
cards.flavorReference: Moon Stalker, Fish Out of Water (EC #13)

cards.title: Hoof Stomp
body: {NightMare} deals each non-Hero Target 1 Sonic Damage. Targets dealt damage this way deal themselves 1 Melee Damage.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Until the start of your next turn, increase the damage {NightMare} deals to targets at full HP by 3.

cards.title: Hot To Trot
body: When this card enters play, {NightMare} deals 1 target 1 Melee damage.
If {NightMare} would be dealt irreducible damage, prevent that damage, then {NightMare} deals herself that much infernal damage.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Choose a hero target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

cards.flavorText: “yeah, stay off the water until{BR}I get this spell figured out.”

cards.title: Kelpie Magic
body: increase damage dealt by {NightMare} by 1.
If {NightMare} would deal melee damage, change its type to infernal.
powers: Draw 1 card. Discard 1 card. Play 1 card.

cards.title: Mano a Casco
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero target.
Damage dealt to that target is irreducible. Damage dealt by that target is irreducible and redirected to {NightMare}.
At the start of your turn, you may destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: Choose a target. the next damage dealt to that target is irreducible.

cards.flavorText: “oh nae ye don't.{BR}ye can't hide from me.”

cards.title: Reined Combat
body: When this card enters play, Draw a card then Discard a card.
powers: {NightMare} deals 1 target 5 Melee damage. increase the next damage dealt by that target by 5.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: increase damage dealt by {NightMare} by 1 until the start of your next turn.

cards.flavorText: “is this what passes{BR}for street fighting?{BR}you must be joking.”

cards.title: Stampede
body: {NightMare} deals each non-Hero Target 1 Melee Damage.
{NightMare} deals each non-Hero Target with 1 HP 1 infernal damage.

cards.title: Two-Trick Pony
body: Whenever you use a power, draw a card.
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.

activatableAbilities.name: discard
activatableAbilities.text: You may return this card to your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: if'n ye weren't{BR}as heavy, I'd say no problem.
